Class Figure

java.lang.Object
  Figure

public abstract class Figure
extends java.lang.Object

An abstract class for shapes that can be manipulated and that draws itself on a canvas.

Version:
5.0 (15 July 2004)
Author:
Mrs. Miyamoto

Method Detail

changeColor

public void changeColor(java.lang.String newColor)
Change the color. Valid colors are "red", "yellow", "blue", "green", "magenta", "white", "orange", "pink", "cyan", "gray", "lightGray", "darkGray" and "black".

changeSize

public abstract void changeSize(int length,
                                int width)
Change the size to the new size (in pixels). Size must be >= 0.

public boolean isVisible()
Return true if this figure is visible else return false.

makeInvisible

public void makeInvisible()
Make this figure invisible. If it was already invisible, do nothing.

makeVisible

public void makeVisible()
Make this figure visible. If it was already visible, do nothing.
